images.copyright: Forest near the village of Invergarry, Scotland (© Matt Anderson Photography/Getty Images)
images.title: The frosted forest
images.caption: The Great Glen
images.desc: Was this photo taken in a peppermint forest? This rare and delicate hoarfrost may look like a confectioner's coating, but it's just the ice that forms when the Scottish Highlands' fog mixes perfectly with a sharp cold snap.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
